repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    ca-certificates \
    cmake \
    gcc \
    libc6-dev \
    make \
    pkg-config \
    git \
    automake \
    libtool \
    m4 \
    autoconf \
    make \
    file \
    binutils && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY xargo.sh /
RUN bash /xargo.sh

COPY cmake.sh /
RUN apt-get purge --auto-remove -y cmake && \
    bash /cmake.sh 3.5.1

RUN apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    g++ \
    zlib1g-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY openssl.sh /
RUN bash /openssl.sh linux-x86_64

COPY qemu.sh /
RUN bash /qemu.sh x86_64 linux softmmu

COPY dropbear.sh /
RUN bash /dropbear.sh

COPY linux-image.sh /
RUN bash /linux-image.sh x86_64

COPY linux-runner /

ENV CARGO_TARGET_X86_64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_RUNNER="/linux-runner x86_64" \
    OPENSSL_DIR=/openssl \
    OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR=/openssl/include \
    OPENSSL_LIB_DIR=/openssl/lib
